thread.title: An unexpected great boutique hotel near time square
thread.title_full: An unexpected great boutique hotel near time square - Review of Kimpton Muse Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: drl_smit-may
title: An unexpected great boutique hotel near time square
text: We needed to come to New York for a short four-day trip. Normally we stay at five star hotels for 1 to 2 weeks. American Express suggested this hotel. It was close to where we had some business to do as well as close to the theater district. This is a beautiful small boutique hotel. We stayed in room 1701 which is a beautiful executive room with a nice view looking down 46 street. The bathroom was unusually large and comfortable for New York. The room was beautifully decorated. The staff could not be more accommodating.would definitely stay here again.
